opinion:
541 U.S. 1027

AT&T CORP.
v.
ALLEN ET UX., ON BEHALF OF THEMSELVES AND ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED.

1

Ct. Civ. App. Okla. Motion of Council on State Taxation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Certiorari denied.
